 class PacketProcessor<T extends AConnection>
          Packet Processor responsible for executing packets in correct order with respecting rules: - 1 packet / client at one time. - execute packets in received order.

Methods in com.aionemu.commons.network with parameters of type AConnection
(package private)  void AcceptDispatcherImpl.closeConnection(AConnection con)
          This method should never be called on this implementation of Dispatcher
(package private)  void AcceptReadWriteDispatcherImpl.closeConnection(AConnection con)
          Add connection to pendingClose list, so this connection will be closed by this Dispatcher as soon as possible.
(package private) abstract  void Dispatcher.closeConnection(AConnection con)
          Add connection to pendingClose list, so this connection will be closed by this Dispatcher as soon as possible.
protected  void Dispatcher.closeConnectionImpl(AConnection con)
          Connection will be closed [onlyClose()] and onDisconnect() method will be executed on another thread [DisconnectionThreadPool] after getDisconnectionDelay() time in ms.
private  boolean Dispatcher.parse(AConnection con, java.nio.ByteBuffer buf)
          Parse data from buffer and prepare buffer for reading just one packet - call processData(ByteBuffer b).
 void Dispatcher.register(java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel ch, int ops, AConnection att)
          Register new client connected to this Dispatcher and set SelectionKey (result of registration) as this key of given AConnection.
